title: Dinnerbone&Searge: 拿到了为GDC准备的新名片
author: Csgbshgf
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2016-3-10 01:50 编辑 

推特原文
Dinnerbone:We got new business cards for GDC, but I much prefer my old one so I'm going to stick with that. https://t.co/sAezcwEUCRSearge:A new business card and my own Mojang avatar. Everything ready for GDC now. Who else will be there? https://t.co/dJ6pdxPnde
Dinnerbone:我们拿到了为GDC(注1)准备的新名片，但是我更喜欢老的那个，所以我打算继续使用它。
Searge:用我在Mojang的头像做的新名片，准备好参加GDC了。还有谁会在那?
注1：游戏开发者大会，详细介绍请见https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Game_Developers_Conference?wprov=sfla1
